verses.roman:
vipra kahe,--"nāmābhāse yadi 'mukti' naya
tabe tomāra nāka kāṭi' karaha niścaya"

synonyms: vipra kahe—the brāhmaṇa said; nāma-ābhāse—simply by the awakening of offenseless chanting of the holy name; yadi—if; mukti naya—liberation is not attainable; tabe—then; tomāra—your; nāka—nose; kāṭi'-I shall cut off; karaha niścaya—take it as certain.
translation: Gopāla Cakravartī said, "if one is not liberated by nāmābhāsa, then you may be certain that I shall cut off your nose."
